m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Cybersecurity is Key to our Clean Energy Future March 10, 2014 by NRDC Switchboard Leave a Comment Allison Clements, Senior Attorney, Project for Sustainable FERC Energy Policy, New York Noting that experts generally agree the risk of a large-scale cyber attack on America’s electricity transmission grid “is significant and must be addressed,” a new report by the Bipartisan Policy Center (BPC)’s Electric Grid Cybersecurity Initiative recommends that government and industry work together to put strong protections in place.
